title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in full-stack development using Python and React. You will be responsible for designing and implementing scalable web applications, working with databases, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain web applications using Python, Django, and React
- Design and optimize database schemas using PostgreSQL
- Implement RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
- Collaborate with product managers and designers
- Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
- Participate in agile development processes

Required Skills:
- 5+ years of experience in software development
- Proficiency in Python, JavaScript, and React
- Experience with Django or Flask frameworks
- Strong knowledge of SQL and database design
- Familiarity with Git version control
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS preferred)
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Junior Data Scientist
description:
Join our growing data science team as a Junior Data Scientist! This is an excellent opportunity for recent graduates or professionals with 1-2 years of experience to grow their career in machine learning and data analytics.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
CloudFirst Technologies is looking for a skilled DevOps Engineer to help us scale our infrastructure and improve our deployment processes. You'll work with cutting-edge cloud technologies and help build robust, automated systems.

Responsibilities:
- Design and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitLab CI
- Manage containerized applications with Docker and Kubernetes
- Monitor and optimize AWS cloud infrastructure
- Implement infrastructure as code using Terraform
- Ensure system security and compliance
- Troubleshoot production issues and implement solutions
- Collaborate with development teams to improve deployment processes

Requirements:
- 3-5 years of experience in DevOps or system administration
- Hands-on experience with AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda)
- Proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes
- Experience with Infrastructure as Code tools (Terraform, CloudFormation)
- Strong scripting skills in Python or Bash
- Knowledge of monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
- Understanding of networking and security best practices
- Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work under pressure

title: Frontend Developer
description:

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
AI Innovations Ltd is at the forefront of artificial intelligence research and development. We are seeking an experienced Machine Learning Engineer to lead our ML initiatives and drive innovation in our products.

Role Overview:
As a Senior ML Engineer, you will design, develop, and deploy machine learning models at scale. You'll work with large datasets, implement state-of-the-art algorithms, and collaborate with research teams to bring cutting-edge AI solutions to production.

Key Responsibilities:
â€¢ Design and implement end-to-end ML pipelines
â€¢ Develop and optimize deep learning models using TensorFlow and PyTorch
â€¢ Work with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop) for data processing
â€¢ Deploy models to production using MLOps best practices
â€¢ Conduct A/B testing and model performance evaluation
â€¢ Research and implement latest ML techniques and algorithms
â€¢ Mentor junior team members and provide technical leadership

Required Qualifications:
â€¢ PhD or Master's in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field
â€¢ 5+ years of experience in machine learning and data science
â€¢ Expert-level proficiency in Python and ML libraries (scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch)
â€¢ Strong mathematical background in statistics, linear algebra, and optimization
â€¢ Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) and containerization (Docker)
â€¢ Proficiency in SQL and NoSQL databases
â€¢ Experience with MLOps tools (MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow)
â€¢ Strong research background with publications preferred
â€¢ Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
â€¢ Leadership experience and ability to work in cross-functional teams

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
